Account Engagement Report
July 2015

  

Region and District Summary for July 2015


Meeting and Email Time with Customer

 

41% of sales reps met the benchmark of 10.5 hours.

Reps averaged 9.4 hours with customers.

  • East
  • West
  • LAMC
  • Current month
  • Goal was met

Unique Accounts Contacted

 

26% of sales reps met the benchmark of 16 unique accounts contacted per week.

Reps averaged 12 unique accounts contacted per week.

  • East
  • West
  • LAMC
  • Current month
  • Goal was met
  • Informational element

Meeting and Email Time with Customer

 

27% of sales reps met the benchmark of 10.5 hours.

Reps averaged 7.6 hours with customers.

Benchmark currently based on Sales (AM) behaviors. More appropriate benchmark for LAMC is currently being considered.

Appendix


Definitions

Accounts Contacted
Accounts to whom Symantec/Region sent an email or with whom they met, but collaboration wasn't substantiative enough to qualify as “engaged”

Accounts Engaged
Accounts with whom Symantec/Region had at least one (1) meeting and spent at least 30 minutes during the period.

Cumulative Engaged
Running total of Accounts with whom Symantec/Region has engaged since April 15.

Symbols

  • indicates current month
  • indicates informational element not part of the current set or a summary element
  • indicates a goal was met
